state_analysis: The terminal is currently in the /app directory as root. There are no previous commands executed in this session that provide context about the mixed integer programming problem or the solver used.
explanation: We will solve the mixed integer programming problem located at /app/question.mps using an appropriate solver (e.g., glpsol or any other solver installed). After obtaining the objective value, we will extract the integer part of that value and save it to answer.txt.

commands.keystrokes: grep 'Objective value' solution.txt | awk '{print int($3)}' > answer.txt
